snippet.title: Hiddens Awakening (EN)
snippet.description:
Download Hiddens Awakening on Google Play  and Steam
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.itdlgames.hiddens
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2086580/Hiddens_Awakening

The Howler Hidden, regains consciousness in the forest, and discovers that his world has changed. 
Can you save the Hiddens from extinction, organize the resistance, and get the situation under control ?
Become the ruthless shadow of the forests in this turn-based strategy game with no chance
